channel.title: Quick npc question
channel.description: hey guys just wanted to ask something i already know how to make npc drop w/e item i want (npc id.percentage item id) but if i want to make it so where an item is 100% drop rate and i want to make another item 2% drop rate in example 20k = 100% drop rate d claws = 2% drop rate i need to copy it under the first 1 right? cause when i go under the npc drop file i see it say kalphite queen then under it says kalphite queen (2) do i also need to do that for other mobs? add a 2 next to it to make it a different percentage drop rate? or do i just type kalphite queen? just a simple basic question plz answer ty.

item.title: Quick npc question
item.dc:creator: @xxbanditxx xxbanditxx
item.description:
@xxbanditxx wrote:

escalation:

Have you tested it? Try copying it under the first one…

actually now that i think about it i just looked at it and the items are the same so i dont think i have to put the 2 next to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick npc question
item.dc:creator: @xxbanditxx xxbanditxx
item.description:
@xxbanditxx wrote:

escalation:

post your the code you are trying to change.

im trying to change almost every mob in the game but look this was already like this
#Kalphite Queen
1160:10 995:100000 892:75 564:50 11335:1 14876:1 15018:1 15019:1 15020:1 15220:1 13734:1 13736:1
#Kalphite Queen (2)
1158:10 995:100000 892:75 564:50 11335:1 14876:1 15018:1 15019:1 15020:1 15220:1 13734:1 13736:1

for example i want kq to drop ashes id make it so its 100% chance but if i also want to make it drop d claws id have to put it underneath the first 1 and make it for exmaple 10% but i want to know that if i put the second 1 underneath the first 1 do i have to put a (2) next to it? or wat? cause that 1 says 2 for some reason …

Read full topic

item.title: Quick npc question

@xxbanditxx wrote:

hey guys just wanted to ask something
i already know how to make npc drop w/e item i want (npc id.percentage item id) but if i want to make it so where an item is 100% drop rate and i want to make another item 2% drop rate
in example 20k = 100% drop rate
d claws = 2% drop rate
i need to copy it under the first 1 right? cause when i go under the npc drop file i see it say
kalphite queen then under it says
kalphite queen (2) do i also need to do that for other mobs? add a 2 next to it to make it a different percentage drop rate? or do i just type kalphite queen?
just a simple basic question plz answer ty.
